text: sihamte allahara bahirae sihamtara pandita arau sansara-biraagisakalaka sihamtara rabaraupe grahana karaiche arau mara'iyamara putra machihako. Athaca eka ilahara ibadata karaara babe'i te'omloka adista haichila. Yara bahirae ana kono satya ilaha na'i. Sihamte yi ansi sthapana karae tara paraa te'om ati paraitra
